original_text:
For he says,
“In a favorable time I listened to you,
    and in a day of salvation I have helped you.”
Behold, now is the favorable time; behold, now is the day of salvation.
korean_text: 이르시되 내가 은혜 베풀 때에 너에게 듣고 구원의 날에 너를 도왔다 하셨으니 보라 지금은 은혜 받을 만한 때요 보라 지금은 구원의 날이로다

sentences.original_text: In a favorable time I listened to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 은혜 받을 때에 들었고

sentences.original_text: and in a day of salvation I have helped you
Behold, now is the favorable time
behold, now is the day of salvation
